paragraphs.body: Many ${link_0} and ${link_1} games have been released, and most of them can be found online on ${link_2}. The online games were first released on Nick.com, but were later moved to Nicktoons.com when the series was taken off Nick's ${link_3} and moved to Nicktoons Network. In 2016, Avatar: The Last Airbender's website as well as the games were moved back to Nick.com when Nicktoons.com was shut down.
paragraphs.text: Many Avatar: The Last Airbender and The Legend of Korra games have been released, and most of them can be found online on Nick.com. The online games were first released on Nick.com, but were later moved to Nicktoons.com when the series was taken off Nick's main channel and moved to Nicktoons Network. In 2016, Avatar: The Last Airbender's website as well as the games were moved back to Nick.com when Nicktoons.com was shut down.

section: Avatar: The Last Airbender – The Burning Earth

paragraphs.body: Sokka has a plan to invade the ${link_0} during an ${link_1}, when the ${link_2} are powerless. After the plan fails, Aang has to find a firebending teacher and must defeat ${link_3} ${link_4} to end the ${link_5}.
section: Avatar: The Last Airbender – Into the Inferno
paragraphs.text: Sokka has a plan to invade the Fire Nation during an eclipse, when the firebenders are powerless. After the plan fails, Aang has to find a firebending teacher and must defeat Fire Lord Ozai to end the Hundred Year War.

links.body: The Legend of Korra: A New Era Begins

paragraphs.text: Based on the TV series, The Legend of Korra, this game was released for Steam, PlayStation Network, and Xbox Live. It follows Korra on her journey between Books One and Two, featuring a new story written by Tim Hedrick with help from Michael Dante DiMartino and Bryan Konietzko. An alternate version, The Legend of Korra: A New Era Begins, was released for 3DS.

paragraphs.body: Aang On! is a mini-game hosted by Nick.com. It revolves around the second book of the ${link_0}, when ${link_1} had to train with ${link_2} and ${link_3} to master ${link_4} and to learn ${link_5}.
paragraphs.text: Aang On! is a mini-game hosted by Nick.com. It revolves around the second book of the series, when Aang had to train with Katara and Toph to master waterbending and to learn earthbending.

paragraphs.body: Amulet Quest is an online platform adventure game hosted by Nick.co.uk. Help Aang recover four of the amulet pieces in four separate stages spanning the world.
paragraphs.text: Amulet Quest is an online platform adventure game hosted by Nick.co.uk. Help Aang recover four of the amulet pieces in four separate stages spanning the world.

paragraphs.body: Avatar: Arena is a game in which you create and customize your own bending characters, before showing your bending skills to defeat opponents of the same and other nations.
paragraphs.text: Avatar: Arena is a game in which you create and customize your own bending characters, before showing your bending skills to defeat opponents of the same and other nations.

paragraphs.body: Help Katara and Aang as they strive to put out multiple forest fires.

paragraphs.body: Autumn Twilight is a single player 3D RPG that was playable on Nick.com from 2005 during the show's first release. Players could choose from a male or female ${link_0} or ${link_1}. There were three chapters to the game that involved doing small tasks, solving puzzles, learning new bending moves and ultimately defeating the Fire Nation leader in your area of the ${link_2}.
paragraphs.text: Autumn Twilight is a single player 3D RPG that was playable on Nick.com from 2005 during the show's first release. Players could choose from a male or female waterbender or earthbender. There were three chapters to the game that involved doing small tasks, solving puzzles, learning new bending moves and ultimately defeating the Fire Nation leader in your area of the Earth Kingdom.

paragraphs.body: Dangerous Dash is an online game where the player jumps between rock walls whilst simultaneously avoiding firebenders and a number of obstructions, the goal being to reach as high as possible.
paragraphs.text: Dangerous Dash is an online game where the player jumps between rock walls whilst simultaneously avoiding firebenders and a number of obstructions, the goal being to reach as high as possible.

paragraphs.body: Dark Into Light is an online game where players travel through levels based on Book Two of The Legend of Korra, defeating enemies, avoiding obstacles, and collecting energy orbs.
paragraphs.text: Dark Into Light is an online game where players travel through levels based on Book Two of The Legend of Korra, defeating enemies, avoiding obstacles, and collecting energy orbs.

paragraphs.body: Earth Healers is a puzzle-solving game that is playable on Nick.com. War machines hide in the smog they have created and threaten the Earth Kingdom. Find them and destroy them.
paragraphs.text: Earth Healers is a puzzle-solving game that is playable on Nick.com. War machines hide in the smog they have created and threaten the Earth Kingdom. Find them and destroy them.

paragraphs.body: Escape from the Spirit World, although a game, consists of stories and plot details that are considered to be canonical. The game is meant to explain the events between the end of Book Two – "${link_0}" and the start of ${link_1} – "${link_2}".
paragraphs.text: Escape from the Spirit World, although a game, consists of stories and plot details that are considered to be canonical. The game is meant to explain the events between the end of Book Two – "The Crossroads of Destiny" and the start of Book Three – "The Awakening".

paragraphs.body: Following ${link_0}'s lightning attack, Aang's spirit must be returned to his physical body.
paragraphs.text: Following Azula's lightning attack, Aang's spirit must be returned to his physical body.

paragraphs.body: There are two versions of the game:
paragraphs.text: There are two versions of the game:

paragraphs.body: A two-player tile game: Each player randomly selects five tiles. On each tile, there are two of the four nation symbols, or a special black ${link_0} tile, which acts as a wildcard.
paragraphs.text: A two-player tile game: Each player randomly selects five tiles. On each tile, there are two of the four nation symbols, or a special black Avatar tile, which acts as a wildcard.

paragraphs.body: A board game for two players: One player gets four Four Nations chips and the other one gets twenty People chips. They have eighty moves to either block the Four Nations chips or to jump over four People chips.
paragraphs.text: A board game for two players: One player gets four Four Nations chips and the other one gets twenty People chips. They have eighty moves to either block the Four Nations chips or to jump over four People chips.

paragraphs.body: Fortress Fight, along with its sequel, is a mini-game hosted by Nick.com. It involves launching projectiles at an opponent's fortress until it is completely destroyed. The object of the game is to destroy your opponent's fortress before they destroy yours.
paragraphs.text: Fortress Fight, along with its sequel, is a mini-game hosted by Nick.com. It involves launching projectiles at an opponent's fortress until it is completely destroyed. The object of the game is to destroy your opponent's fortress before they destroy yours.

paragraphs.body: Fortress Fight 2 is a mini game hosted by Nick.com, in which each player gets a fortress and, using bending skills, you try to destroy your opponent's fort. The game has multiple levels, each one being harder than the last one.
paragraphs.text: Fortress Fight 2 is a mini game hosted by Nick.com, in which each player gets a fortress and, using bending skills, you try to destroy your opponent's fort. The game has multiple levels, each one being harder than the last one.

paragraphs.body: Four Nations Tournament is a mini-game hosted on Nick.com. The objective is to use bending to score points by launching a ball past your opponent's goal line. As a player, you represent one of the ${link_0} by playing as ${link_1}, ${link_2}, ${link_3}, or ${link_4}.
paragraphs.text: Four Nations Tournament is a mini-game hosted on Nick.com. The objective is to use bending to score points by launching a ball past your opponent's goal line. As a player, you represent one of the four nations by playing as Katara, Toph, Zuko, or Aang.

paragraphs.body: Hangman is a game hosted by Nick.com. The object of the game is for the player to accurately guess the unknown word given by selecting the letters they believe are correct. However, if the player selects an incorrect letter, it results in getting a fire blast pelted at Aang by Zuko. If the player continues guessing incorrectly, the fire blasts will continue to hit Aang until the player gets up to eight incorrect guesses; the game would be over and the player has the option to begin a new game. If the player correctly guesses the word, Aang will redirect the fire blast, and the player is given another word to guess.
paragraphs.text: Hangman is a game hosted by Nick.com. The object of the game is for the player to accurately guess the unknown word given by selecting the letters they believe are correct. However, if the player selects an incorrect letter, it results in getting a fire blast pelted at Aang by Zuko. If the player continues guessing incorrectly, the fire blasts will continue to hit Aang until the player gets up to eight incorrect guesses; the game would be over and the player has the option to begin a new game. If the player correctly guesses the word, Aang will redirect the fire blast, and the player is given another word to guess.

paragraphs.body: Jingle Brawl is a game that was hosted on Nick.com where you could compete against other animated Nickelodeon character. The game has three modes: Training, Arcade, and Tournament mode.
